security.title: Security and Privacy
security.a1: Yes. We use AES-256 bank-level encryption and comply with international standards. Your information is confidential and only you have access to it.
security.q2: How does Tymon connect to my banks?
security.a2: We use a secure consolidation API, following global digital banking standards. This only allows us to read your balances and movements, never transfer or handle funds.

multibanking.title: Multibanking Functionality
multibanking.a1: Of course. Tymon is a real multibanking platform that integrates all your accounts and cards, showing all your balances and movements in real-time.
multibanking.q2: Does it work with foreign currency accounts?
multibanking.a2: Yes. Tymon consolidates balances in Bs. and USD (and even other currencies with the Pro plan), applying the official BCV rate or a market rate pre-selected by you for a unified view.

beginners.title: Usage and Assistance for Beginners
beginners.q1: What if I don't know about finances?
beginners.a1: No problem. Tymon is your financial assistant. It guides you with alerts, practical financial education, and personalized recommendations on when to save or adjust your budget.

plans.title: Plans and Trials
plans.q1: Can I try the Premium version?
plans.a1: Sure. You have 14 days free (no card commitment) to explore all automation, multibanking, and smart reporting features.

automation.title: Automation and Smart Savings
automation.q1: What exactly does AI do to save?
automation.a1: It analyzes your spending patterns, identifies surplus periods (days when you spend less than projected), and performs "micro-transfers" of money towards your goals, ensuring it never affects your essential expenses.
